message.content:
Here's a detailed breakdown of the information in the provided Executive Document Summary form, formatted as a JSON file:

```json
{
    "amendment_number": 2,
    "contract_number": "0000000000000000000037987",
    "contract_description": "This is an Amendment to the Contract entered into by and between the Indiana Family and Social Services Administration, Office of Early Childhood and Out of School Learning and CHANCES AND SERVICES FOR YOUTH, INC. (the Contractor) approved by the last State signatory on November 25, 2019.",
    "purpose_of_amendment": [
        "Extend the term",
        "Amend two exhibits",
        "Provide the Division of Supplier Diversity (DSD) statuses"
    ],
    "extended_period": "1 year",
    "termination_date": "September 30, 2024",
    "consideration_increase": "$727,998.71",
    "total_remuneration": "$4,178,193.57",
    "payment_structure": "Contractor shall be paid pursuant to the pricing and fees detailed in Exhibit 2B—Payment Structure, which is attached hereto and incorporated herein. Exhibit 2B—Payment Structure replaces and supersedes Exhibit 2A—Payment Structure.",
    "contractor_duties": "Due to the extension of the Contract, the Contractor's duties are modified as detailed in Exhibit 1A—Scope of Work, attached hereto and incorporated herein. Exhibit 1A—Scope of Work replaces and supersedes Exhibit 1—Scope of Work.",
    "dsd_statuses": "Unchanged and are as follows: Minority and Women's Business Enterprises Compliance.",
    "mbe_wbe_compliance": {
        "subcontractors": [
            {
                "mbe_wbe": "MBE",
                "phone": "800-580-7483",
                "company_name": "Rite Quality Office Supplies, Inc.",
                "scope_of_products_and_services": "Provide office supplies",
                "utilization_date": "10/1/2019",
                "percent": "1.045"
            },
            {
                "mbe_wbe": "WBE",
                "phone": "217-264-0758",
                "company_name": "RJL Solutions",
                "scope_of_products_and_services": "Provide office supplies",
                "utilization_date": "6/30/2023",
                "percent": "4.00"
            }
        ],
        "requirements": "A copy of each subcontractor agreement must be submitted to the Division of Supplier Diversity within thirty (30) days of the effective date of this Amendment. The subcontractor agreements may be uploaded into Pay Audit (Indiana's subcontractor payment auditing system), emailed to MWBECompliance@idoa.IN.gov, or mailed to the Division of Supplier Diversity, 402 W. Washington Street Room W-462, Indianapolis IN 46204. Failure to provide a copy of any subcontractor agreement may be deemed a violation of the rules governing MBE/WBE procurement and may result in sanctions allowable under 25 IAC 5-7-8. Requests for changes must be submitted to MWBECompliance@idoa.IN.gov for review and approval before changing the participation plan submitted in connection with this Amendment."
    },
    "page_information": "Page 1 of 20"
}
```

This JSON data accurately reflects the details and information contained in the Executive Document Summary form related to the contract amendment.
